name: Creamy Bacon-Wrapped Chicken
author: jenkin421
summary: This is the YUMMIEST dish ever! You will get this one requested over and over.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
6  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - pounded 1/4 inch thick
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Mix cream cheese and green onions in a bowl; season with salt and black pepper
Spread about 1/4 cup of cream cheese mixture over each chicken breast
Starting at the narrow end, roll chicken breasts over filling
Wrap each chicken breast in 4 slices of bacon
Set wrapped chicken on a rack set in a baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven until bacon is browned and an instant-read meat thermometer inserted into the thickest part of a breast reads 160 degrees F (70 degrees C), about 1 hour
